thread.title: Collection of images shows America's Deep South | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Collection of images shows America's Deep South | Daily Mail Online

author: Charlie Moore For Mailonline
title: Collection of images shows America's Deep South | Daily Mail Online
text: Extraordinary collection of images shows America's Deep South in era of segregation and the poverty of Harlem in the 1960s The images were taken by photographer and film-maker Gordon Parks in California, Alabama and Harlem Parks, who was born in Kansas in 1912, was an author, poet and composer who worked for Life and Vogue These images have been released alongside new book titled I Am You which celebrates his pioneering work An exhibition titled Gordon Parks: Back to Fort Scott is on show at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston I Am You is published by The Gordon Parks Foundation, c/o Berlin and Steidl
